Swap 30 minutes of TV time for a brisk walk around your neighbourhood this evening.

full_insight: Did you know replacing one sugary teh tarik with unsweetened tea prevents absorption of ~8 sugar cubes daily? Ask for 'teh o kosong' (tea without sugar or milk) instead of sweet teh tarik at the coffeeshop.
